text: Records containing information about customers,
businesses or products have become increasingly fragmented
and are often siloed across a range of channels,
applications, and data stores.
Companies find it difficult
to link all of these records together into a single view,
making it harder for them to analyze information,
generate insights and deliver relevant customer experiences.
AWS Entity Resolution is an easy
to configure machine learning powered service
that helps you match and link related records
with entity resolution workflows that are flexible,
scalable and can seamlessly connect
to your existing applications.
You can set up pre-configured workflows in minutes
instead of months, allowing your teams
to focus more on customers and drive business results.
AWS Entity Resolution allows you
to configure advanced machine learning,
and rule-based matching techniques, to de-duplicate records,
create unified views of your customers, link product codes
and prepare your data for AI model training,
helping to improve your business outcomes.
And by minimizing the need to move data out
of your environment, AWS Entity Resolution helps you better
protect and maintain control of your data,
improve the quality of your data quickly and more easily.
Get started with AWS Entity Resolution today.
